column5: Hi guys, i'm new to burlington and I'm looking for a few new places to fish.  Is there anything decent at this time of year?  thanks for your help.
mae the drive to the grand river.  its well worth it
theres always bronte its closer the grand is good though
yup, bronte, grand and the credit rivers
Niagara not much further than the grand
thanks guys, im missing all my fishing on georgian bay in midland, time for a change i guess!
If you want to hit the lake one day for salmon shout me a pm. Dan
